Feats-Skill-Occultism -- Male Half-Elf Bard: 2

Muse: 1 selection
Polymath: Has the Versatile Performance feature
Skill Feats: Skill Feats (Choose 1 from any)
Cooperative Nature: +4 Aid checks
Half-Elf: Has the elf trait and may take elf and half-elf feats
Low-Light Vision: Has normal vision in dim light
Multifarious Muse (Enigma): Can select enigma muse feats
Perception: +7 (wisdom; expert)

Acrobatics: +2 (dexterity; untrained) Herbalism Lore: +5 (intelligence; trained) Religion: +5 (wisdom; trained)

Languages: Abyssal; Common; Undercommon
Skill Notes:
Bard Skills: Skill Trained (Occultism; Performance; Choose 5 from any)
Intelligence Language Bonus: +1 Language Count
Esoteric Polymath: Can use Occultism to add spells to spellbook
Oddity Identification: +2 Occultism to Identify Magic with a mental, possession, prediction, or scrying trait
Student Of The Canon: Critical failures on Religion checks to Decipher Writing or Recall Knowledge are normal failures/Failures to Recall Knowledge about own faith are successes, and successes are critical successes
Versatile Performance: Can use Performance in place of Deception, Diplomacy, or Intimidation to Impersonate, Make An Impression, Demoralize, or to satisfy prerequisites

Hit Points: 28 Armor Class: 16 (dexterity; trained)
Armor: None Shield: None

Dexterity Armor Class Adjustment: +2
Dexterity Attack Adjustment: +2
Strength Attack Adjustment: +2
Save: Fortitude: +6 (constitution; trained); Reflex: +6 (dexterity; trained); Will: +7 (wisdom; expert)
Magic
Spell Slots: O1: 3; OC1: 5 Focus Points: 1 Attack: Occult: +5 (charisma; trained) Spell DC: Occult: 15 (charisma; trained)
Spells:
Counter Performance (O1 Foc Enc): (R) Allies in a 60' emanation may substitute a self Performance roll for a save vs. the triggering auditory or visual effect
Inspire Courage (OC1 Foc Enc): (1) 60' emanation gives allies +1 attack, damage, and saves vs. fear for 1 rd
Unseen Servant (O1 Con): (3) R60' Invisible servant with 4 Hit Points and a 30' fly Speed obeys commands to move and manipulate objects while sustained or until reduced to 0 HP
Magic Notes:
Composition Spells: Knows the Counter Performance and Inspire Courage occult spells/Has a focus pool and 1 Focus Point
Occult Spellcasting: Can learn spells from the occult tradition
Polymath: Knows the Unseen Servant occult spell
Bizarre Magic: Increases DCs by 5 to Recognize Spells and Identify Magic on self spells and magic use
Esoteric Polymath: Can prepare 1 spell from spellbook during daily prep, treating it as an additional signature spell if it is in repertoire
Notes
Validation Errors:
Bizarre Magic Feat: Requires level (currently 2) >= 7 and occultism rank (currently 1) >= 3
General And Skill Feat Allocation: 1 available vs. 2 allocated
